nodes.text: The Corellian Queen, owned by the Nebula Line corporation was supposedly the greatest luxury liner in the galaxy.

Its exorbitant prices were not the only thing that kept all but the wealthiest beings in the galaxy from buying tickets: people had to prove their exquisite breeding and manners before they could even purchase a ticket on the liner.

Five and a half years after the Battle of Yavin, the Corellian Queen was taking a break from its regular cruising season, having been replaced by an empty shell that contained a fighter wing led by Rogue Squadron in an action of the Combined Defense Forces of the New Republic Special Operations against Lord Shadowspawn.
